item.title: 分析师称空客 8 月交付约 60 架飞机后将面临冲刺目标的挑战
item.description: 业内人士和分析师周一表示，空中客车公司在 8 月份交付了约 60 架飞机后，需要以创纪录的速度交付飞机，以实现其年度目标。【原文：Airbus needs to deliver planes at a record pace to reach its annual target after delivering about 60 aircraft in August, industry sources and analysts said on Monday.】

item.title: 据 Semafor 报道，阿布扎比支持的 G42 公司旨在使人工智能园区的芯片供应商多样化
item.description: 据 Semafor 周一援引一位直接了解谈判情况的人士的话报道，阿布扎比支持的科技集团 G42 旨在为阿联酋-美国人工智能园区提供除英伟达（Nvidia）之外的多样化芯片供应商。【原文：Abu Dhabi-backed technology group G42 aims to diversify chip suppliers beyond Nvidia for the UAE-U.S. AI campus, Semafor reported on Monday, citing a person with direct knowledge of the talks.】

item.title: 在墨西哥边境小镇，特朗普关税导致数千人失业
item.description: 法比奥拉-加利西亚（Fabiola Galicia）在德克萨斯州埃尔帕索市边境另一端的华雷斯城一家生产装饰丝带的工厂里工作了 11 年，一路步步高升。她从生产线工人做起，最终晋升为管理 30 名员工的经理。【原文：For 11 years, Fabiola Galicia worked her way up the ranks at a factory that produced decorative ribbons in Ciudad Juarez, just across the border from El Paso, Texas. Starting as a production line worker, she was eventually promoted to manager overseeing 30 employees.】

item.title: 特斯拉在部分欧洲市场的销量下滑已持续第八个月
item.description: 由于来自中国电动汽车竞争对手和传统汽车制造商的竞争日益激烈，以及对首席执行官埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）讨好极右翼政党的反弹，特斯拉 8 月份在一些欧洲市场的销售颓势已持续到第八个月。【原文：Tesla's sales rout in some European markets extended to an eighth month in August amid mounting competition from both Chinese EV rivals and traditional automakers, as well as a backlash against CEO Elon Musk's courting of far-right parties.】

item.title: 消息人士称，Finastra 考虑以 10 亿美元出售中东和亚洲业务
item.description: 两位熟悉内情的人士透露，金融软件公司 Finastra 正在探索出售其中东和亚洲核心银行部门，交易价格可能超过 10 亿美元。【原文：Financial software company Finastra is exploring a sale of its Middle Eastern and Asian core banking unit, two people familiar with the matter said, in a deal that could fetch more than $1 billion.】

item.title: 雷诺聘请前梅赛德斯高管卡特琳-阿特管理达契亚品牌
item.description: 法国汽车制造商雷诺公司周一表示，该公司任命前梅赛德斯-奔驰副总裁卡特琳-阿德特（Katrin Adt）担任其低成本品牌达契亚（Dacia）的总经理，在新任首席执行官弗朗索瓦-普罗沃斯特（Francois Provost）的领导下对管理团队进行了重组。【原文：French carmaker Renault appointed former Mercedes-Benz vice president Katrin Adt as managing director of its low-cost Dacia brand, the company said on Monday, as it revamps its management team under new CEO Francois Provost.】

item.title: 英国凯诺斯公司因乐观的年度前景而跃升
item.description: 凯诺斯公司周一股价大涨超过 16%，此前这家 IT 软件开发商表示，受过去五个月销售强劲的帮助，预计其年度前景将达到一致预测的上限。【原文：Shares of Kainos jumped more than 16% on Monday after the IT software developer said it was expecting its annual outlook to be at the upper end of consensus forecasts, helped by sturdy sales in the last five months.】

item.title: 英国采购经理人指数（PMI）显示：新订单回落，英国工厂步履蹒跚
item.description: 据周一公布的一项调查显示，由于担心国外贸易紧张局势和国内税收增加，英国制造商在出现新订单下降的复苏迹象后，8 月份又遭遇了新的挫折。【原文：Britain's manufacturers suffered a fresh setback in August after signs of a recovery with new orders dropping due to worries about trade tensions abroad and tax increases at home, according to a survey published on Monday.】

item.title: 印度石油部长否认该国从俄罗斯进口产品中牟取暴利
item.description: 印度石油部长哈迪普-辛格-普里（Hardeep Singh Puri）周一在《印度教徒报》上说，印度并没有从俄罗斯的石油进口中 "牟取暴利"，印度的石油采购稳定了市场，同时使价格没有上涨到每桶 200 美元。【原文：India is not "profiteering" from Russian oil imports and its purchases have stabilised markets while keeping prices from rising to as much as $200 a barrel, Hardeep Singh Puri, country's oil minister, said in the Hindu newspaper on Monday.】

item.title: 印度强劲的经济增长未能给股票投资者留下深刻印象
item.description: 由于定价能力减弱和美国关税对企业盈利造成压力，外国投资者纷纷撤离，印度举世瞩目的经济增长未能转化为股市收益。【原文：India's world-beating economic growth is failing to translate into gains for equity markets as weakening pricing power and U.S. tariffs weigh on corporate earnings, turning foreign investors away.】

item.title: 特斯拉 8 月份在瑞典的注册量暴跌 84
item.description: 瑞典移动通信公司（Mobility Sweden）周一提供的数据显示，8月份瑞典的特斯拉新车注册量同比下降了84%，仅为210辆。【原文：Registrations of new Tesla cars in Sweden fell 84% in August from a year earlier, to 210 vehicles, data from Mobility Sweden showed on Monday.】

item.title: 欧洲央行行长拉加德警告特朗普干预美联储给世界经济带来风险
item.description: 欧洲央行行长克里斯蒂娜-拉加德（Christine Lagarde）周一表示，如果美国总统唐纳德-特朗普解除美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔或美联储理事丽莎-库克的职务，那么这将对美国经济和世界经济构成 "非常严重的危险"。【原文：If U.S. President Donald Trump removed Federal Reserve Chairman Jerome Powell or Fed governor Lisa Cook, then this would represent a "very serious danger for the U.S. economy and the world economy", the European Central Bank President Christine Lagarde said on Monday.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，OpenAI 计划在印度建立至少 1 千兆瓦容量的数据中心
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周一援引未具名消息人士的话报道，ChatGPT 的母公司 OpenAI 正在寻找当地合作伙伴，以便在印度建立一个容量至少为 1 千兆瓦的数据中心。【原文：ChatGPT parent OpenAI is scouting local partners to set up a data center in India with at least 1 gigawatt capacity, Bloomberg News reported on Monday, citing unidentified sources.】

item.title: 中国协鑫有望很快获得更多有关多晶硅重组的信息
item.description: 协鑫科技控股公司的一位官员周日在与投资者的通话中表示，有关中国多晶硅产业重组计划的更多信息将很快发布。【原文：A GCL Technology Holdings official signalled in a call with investors on Sunday that more information on a plan to restructure China's polysilicon industry would be released soon.】

item.title: 欧洲 中国市场掀起人工智能热潮
item.description: 韦恩-科尔对欧洲和全球市场未来一天的展望。【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Wayne Cole.】

item.title: 返校：市场为九月风险做好准备
item.description: 夏季交易的冷清似乎将戛然而止，9 月份的风险正在迅速积聚。【原文：A summer trading lull looks set to come to a halt with September risks stacking up hard and fast.】

item.title: 波兰央行周三将关键利率下调 25 个基点：路透调查
item.description: 路透社的一项民意调查显示，大多数受访者预计波兰国家银行将于周三恢复降息，因为通胀率已降至该行的目标范围内。【原文：The National Bank of Poland is expected to resume lowering interest rates on Wednesday, a majority of respondents in a Reuters poll said, as inflation falls within the bank's target range.】

item.title: 澳大利亚报告引发对青少年社交禁令前年龄验证软件的担忧
item.description: 澳大利亚政府委托编写的一份报告称，基于自拍的年龄猜测软件可以执行青少年社交媒体禁令，但报告指出，一些群体遇到了 "不可接受的 "不准确程度，这引起了人们对 12 月推出的软件的担忧。【原文：An Australian government-commissioned report said selfie-based age guessing software could enforce a teen social media ban, but noted that some groups experienced "unacceptable" levels of inaccuracy, raising concerns about the December rollout.】

item.title: 全球经济 美国加征关税，亚洲工厂活动萎缩，中国逆势而上
item.description: 周一的民间调查显示，美国关税对整个亚洲的工厂活动造成了影响，为中国出人意料的乐观表现蒙上了阴影，使政策制定者继续面临支撑该地区脆弱经济复苏的压力。【原文：U.S. tariffs took a toll on factory activity across Asia, overshadowing a surprisingly upbeat performance in China, private surveys showed on Monday, keeping pressure on policymakers to underpin the region's fragile economic recovery.】

item.title: 美国加大在华生产芯片的难度后，三星和 SK 海力士股价下跌
item.description: 三星电子（Samsung Electronics）和SK海力士（SK Hynix）的股票周一下跌，因为华盛顿撤销了允许这两家公司为其在中国的芯片工厂获得美国半导体制造设备的授权。【原文：Shares in Samsung Electronics and SK Hynix dropped on Monday after Washington revoked authorisations that allowed them to secure U.S. semiconductor manufacturing equipment for their chip plants in China.】

item.title: 澳大利亚监管机构起诉四家涉嫌操纵价格的 ALDI 供应商
item.description: 澳大利亚竞争监管机构周一表示，已开始对几家生鲜供应商提起民事诉讼，指控他们在向德国折扣零售商 ALDI 澳大利亚分部供应蔬菜时操纵价格。【原文：Australia's competition regulator said on Monday it has started civil proceedings against a couple of fresh produce suppliers over allegations of price fixing in their supply of vegetables to the Australian division of German discount retailer ALDI.】

item.title: 澳新银行-Indeed数据显示，8月份澳大利亚招聘广告保持稳定
item.description: 澳大利亚 8 月份的招聘广告保持稳定，凸显出在利率降低的情况下劳动力市场依然具有活力，而零售业招聘的反弹预计将持续到未来几个月。【原文：Australian job advertisements were steady in August, highlighting a still resilient labour market amid lower interest rates, while a bounce in retail hiring was expected to persist into coming months.】

item.title: 投资者等待美国劳动力市场指标，美元随之漂移
item.description: 周一，美元走势飘忽不定，因为市场期待本周一系列美国劳动力市场数据，这些数据可能决定美联储本月晚些时候降息的预期幅度。【原文：The dollar was adrift on Monday as markets looked ahead to a raft of U.S. labour market data this week that could determine the size of the Federal Reserve's expected rate cut later this month.】

item.title: 科技股回落，亚洲股市在非农测试前下滑
item.description: 周一，亚洲股市以红盘开局，此前法院的一项裁决再次对美国的关税政策造成冲击，投资者也在为可能决定美国降息进程的美国就业数据做好准备。【原文：Asian shares started the new month in the red on Monday after a court ruling threw another wrench into U.S. tariff policy and investors braced for a reading on U.S. jobs that could determine the course of rate cuts there.】

item.title: 特斯拉下调长续航 RWD Model 3 在中国的售价
item.description: 该汽车制造商上个月在中国推出了特斯拉最长程车型 Model 3 变体。【原文：The automaker launched the Model 3 variant, its longest-range Tesla model, in China last month.】

item.title: 埃里克-特朗普指导的日本比特币公司 Metaplanet 将就集资计划进行表决
item.description: 埃里克-特朗普（Eric Trump）预计将于周一出席日本比特币财务公司 Metaplanet 在东京举行的股东大会，美国总统的家族将在国际上拓展其加密企业。【原文：Eric Trump is expected to attend a shareholder meeting of Japanese bitcoin treasury company Metaplanet in Tokyo on Monday, as the U.S. president's family expands its crypto ventures internationally.】

item.title: 石油价格维持在狭窄区间，产量增加抵消了俄罗斯的供应中断影响
item.description: 周一，油价在狭窄区间内交投，因为对产量上升和美国关税对需求影响的担忧抵消了俄乌空袭加剧造成的供应中断。【原文：Oil prices traded in a tight range on Monday as worries about rising output and the impact of U.S. tariffs on demand offset supply disruptions stemming from intensified Russia-Ukraine airstrikes.】

item.title: 美国加征关税，韩国 8 月出口不及预期
item.description: 周一的贸易数据显示，韩国 8 月份出口增长的放缓程度超出了市场预期，因为关税导致运往美国的货物跌至 COVID-19 大流行以来的最大跌幅。【原文：South Korea's export growth in August slowed more than markets had anticipated, as tariffs sent U.S.-bound shipments tumbling to their sharpest decline since the COVID-19 pandemic, trade data showed on Monday.】

item.title: 共和党议员兰克福德说，美联储必须保持独立
item.description: 美国财政部委员会的一位共和党参议员周日强调了独立美联储的重要性，与副总统万斯（JD Vance）关于总统和民选官员应该对货币政策有发言权的说法不同。【原文：A Republican U.S. senator on the finance committee on Sunday stressed the importance of an independent Federal Reserve, diverging from Vice President JD Vance's statement that the president and elected officials should have a say in monetary policy.】

item.title: Cotality称，8月份澳大利亚房价攀升，原因是供不应求
item.description: 房地产咨询公司 Cotality 周一表示，受买家需求增加和广告库存量较低的影响，8 月份澳大利亚房价有所上涨。【原文：Australian home prices rose in August, driven by increased buyer demand and low levels of advertised stock, property consultant Cotality said on Monday.】
